description:
### Making authorized API calls

To make OAuth requests to the Printful API, `access_token` and `token_type` must be included in the request `Authorization` header.

```
# Authorized CURL request example with OAuth
curl -X GET 'https://api.printful.com/v2/orders' \
-H 'Authorization: Bearer smk_GN0I1Os3OdfqzjJnTOWn1wlbqqq2Y2Pc10TS'
```

scopes.orders: Read and Write access to Orders
scopes.stores_list: Read and Write access to Stores
scopes.file_library: Read and Write access to File library
scopes.webhooks: Read and Write access to Webhooks
